name: K-array Mastiff KM112P
headline: Passive compact 12" coaxial stage monitor
definition: Passive compact Mastiff stage monitor featuring a coaxial 12" woofer for monitoring and drum-fill applications.
description: Mastiff KM112P is a passive compact stage monitor designed to deliver clear, powerful monitoring on modern stages. Its coaxial 12-inch design ensures focused sound with high intelligibility, even at high output levels.
story: Designed for stage monitoring and drum-fill applications, the KM112P combines a compact form factor with high headroom and controlled dispersion. When driven by K-array amplifiers with dedicated presets, it provides accurate and reliable monitoring for performers and engineers.

lifestyle.alt: Mastiff KM112P used as a vocal stage monitor
Low-profile side view of Mastiff KM112P wedge
Close-up of Mastiff KM112P grille and logo
Mastiff KM112P deployed on a live performance riser

name: K-array Mastiff KM312P
headline: Flagship triple-12" Mastiff for arena stages
description: Mastiff KM312P is a large-format wedge that delivers huge headroom and authority for rock stages, drum risers and high-SPL monitoring.
story: When artists demand the feel of a PA in front of them, KM312P steps in. Multiple 12-inch drivers and focused horn loading keep the sound tight and controlled, even when the monitor mix gets aggressive.
definition: Large-format active Mastiff monitor with triple 12" engine for high-SPL stages.
finish: Flagship touring black with reinforced hardware
drivers: Triple 12" low-frequency section with dedicated HF horn

lifestyle.alt: Mastiff KM312P as drum wedge on riser
Mastiff KM312P side view showing cabinet profile

items.label: Spec 1
items.value: Triple 12" configuration for massive headroom and impact

items.label: Spec 2
items.value: Active multi-channel amplification with DSP presets

items.label: Spec 3
items.value: Voiced for drum, bass and high-energy artist mixes

items.label: Spec 4
items.value: Cabinet angles optimised for nearfield and backline use

items.label: Spec 5
items.value: Heavy-duty hardware for touring and rental fleets

name: K-array Turtle KRM33P
headline: Ultra-low-profile monitor that disappears on stage
description: Turtle KRM33P is a low-profile, high-clarity stage monitor that all but disappears to cameras and audience sightlines while keeping artists fully locked to the mix.
story: Designed for broadcast stages, theatres and premium venues, KRM33P hugs the stage edge with a shallow footprint, providing precise coverage without visually dominating the set.
definition: Ultra-low-profile active monitor for theatre, broadcast and high-end stages.
finish: Immersive matte black with discreet form factor
drivers: Slim multi-driver array with integrated amplification and DSP

lifestyle.alt: Turtle KRM33P on theatre stage front edge
Turtle KRM33P in broadcast or TV studio

items.label: Spec 1
items.value: Low-profile chassis designed to vanish from camera and audience sightlines

items.label: Spec 2
items.value: Integrated amplification with DSP presets for speech, vocal and band mixes

items.label: Spec 3
items.value: Tight pattern control to focus energy on the performer zone

items.label: Spec 4
items.value: Multiple mounting and coupling options for creative staging

items.value: Ideal where visuals and clean lines are as important as sound
